source_sentence: 大雲輪請雨經卷上
translation: Danyunlun wenhu jing shoushang

source_sentence: 隋天竺三藏那連提耶舍譯
translation: Translated by the Sui Tianzang Tripiṭaka Nālandīyaśas

source_sentence: 如是我聞。
translation: Thus I have heard.

source_sentence: 一時佛在難陀優婆難陀龍王宮內。
translation: One time, the Buddha was inside the palace of Upananda, the dragon king of Nandanavana.

source_sentence: 住大威德摩尼之藏大雲輪殿寶樓閣中。
translation: He was staying in the jeweled tower of the great cloud-turning hall in the storehouse of the great majestic maṇi.

source_sentence: 與大比丘及諸菩薩摩訶薩眾周匝圍繞。
translation: He was surrounded by a large assembly of monks and bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and others.

source_sentence: 復有無量諸大龍王。
translation: There are also measureless great dragon kings.

source_sentence: 其名曰難陀龍王　優鉢難陀龍王　娑伽羅龍王　阿那婆達多龍王　摩那斯龍王　婆婁那龍王　德叉迦龍王　提頭賴吒龍王　婆修吉龍王　目真隣陀龍王　伊羅跋那龍王　分陀利龍王　威光龍王　德賢龍王　電冠龍王　大摩尼寶髻龍王　摩尼珠髻龍王　光耀頂龍王　帝釋鋒伏龍王　帝釋幢龍王　帝釋杖龍王　閻浮金幢龍王　善和龍王　大輪龍王　大蟒蛇龍王　火光味龍王　月耀龍王　慧威龍王　善見龍王　大善見龍王　善住龍王　摩尼瓔龍王　興雲龍王　持雨龍王　大忿吒聲龍王　小忿吒聲龍王　奮迅龍王　大頻拏龍王　大項龍王　深聲龍王　大深聲龍王　大雄猛龍王　優鉢羅龍王　大步龍王　螺髮龍王　質多羅斯那龍王　持大羂索龍王　伊羅樹葉龍王　先慰問龍王　驢耳龍王　海貝龍王　達陀羅龍王　優波達陀羅龍王　安隱龍王　大安隱龍王　毒蛇龍王　大毒蛇龍王　大力龍王　呼婁茶龍王　阿波羅龍王　藍浮龍王　吉利彌賒龍王　黑色龍王　因陀羅軍龍王　那茶龍王　優波那茶龍王　甘浮紇利那龍王　陀毘茶龍王　端正龍王　象耳龍王　猛利龍王　黃目龍王　電光龍王　大電光龍王　天力龍王　金婆羅龍王　妙蓋龍王　甘露龍王　得道泉龍王　琉璃光龍王　金色髮龍王　金光龍王　月光相龍王　日光龍王　始興龍王　牛頭龍王　白相龍王　黑相龍王　耶摩龍王　沙彌龍王　蝦蟇龍王　僧伽茶龍王　尼民陀羅龍王　持地龍王　千頭龍王　寶頂龍王　滿願龍王　細雨龍王　須彌那龍王　瞿波羅龍王　仁德龍王　善行龍王　宿德龍王　金毘羅龍王　金毘羅頭龍王　持毒龍王　蛇身龍王　蓮華龍王　大尾龍王　騰轉龍王　可畏龍王　善威德龍王　五頭龍王　婆利羅龍王　妙車龍王　優多羅龍王　長尾龍王　大頭龍王　賓畢迦龍王　毘茶龍王　馬形龍王　三頭龍王　龍仙龍王　大威德龍王　火德龍王　恐人龍王　焰光龍王　七頭龍王　現大身龍王　善愛見龍王　大惡龍王　淨威德龍王　妙眼龍王　大毒龍王　焰聚龍王　大害龍王　大瞋忿龍王　寶雲龍王　大雲施水龍王　帝釋光龍王　波陀波龍王　月雲龍王　海雲龍王　大香華龍王　華出龍王　寶眼龍王　大相幢龍王　大雲藏龍王　降雪龍王　威德藏龍王　雲戟龍王　持夜龍王　降雨龍王　雲雨龍王　大雲雨龍王　火光龍王　大雲主龍王　無瞋恚龍王　鳩鳩婆龍王　那伽首羅龍王　闍隣提龍王　雲蓋龍王　應祁羅目佉龍王　威德龍王　出雲龍王　無盡步龍王　妙相龍王　大身龍王　大腹龍王　安審龍王　丈夫龍王　歌歌那龍王　欝頭羅龍王　猛毒龍王　妙聲龍王　甘露實龍王　大散雨龍王　隱隱聲龍王　雷相擊聲龍王　鼓震聲龍王　注甘露龍王　天帝鼓龍王　霹靂音龍王　首羅仙龍王　那羅延龍王　涸水龍王　毘迦吒龍王有如是等諸大龍王而為上首。
translation: 其名曰難陀龍王　優鉢難陀龍王　娑伽羅龍王　阿那婆達多龍王　摩那斯龍王　婆婁那龍王　德叉迦龍王　提頭賴吒龍王　婆修吉龍王　目真隣陀龍王　伊羅跋那龍王　分陀利龍王　威光龍王　德賢龍王　電冠龍王　大摩尼寶髻龍王　摩尼珠髻龍王　光耀頂龍王　帝釋鋒伏龍王　帝釋幢龍王　帝釋杖龍王　閻浮金幢龍王　善和龍王　大輪龍王　大蟒蛇龍王　火光味龍王　月耀龍王　慧威龍王　善見龍王　大善見龍王　善住龍王　摩尼瓔龍王　興雲龍王　持雨龍王　大忿吒聲龍王　小忿吒聲龍王　奮迅龍王　大頻拏龍王　大項龍王　深聲龍王　大深聲龍王　大雄猛龍王　優鉢羅龍王　大步龍王　螺髮龍王　質多羅斯那龍王　持大羂索龍王　伊羅樹葉龍王　先慰問龍王　驢耳龍王　海貝龍王　達陀羅龍王　優波達陀羅龍王　安隱龍王　大安隱龍王　毒蛇龍王　大毒蛇龍王　大力龍王　呼婁茶龍王　阿波羅龍王　藍浮龍王　吉利彌賒龍王　黑色龍王　因陀羅軍龍王　那茶龍王　優波那茶龍王　甘浮紇利那龍王　陀毘茶龍王　端正龍王　象耳龍王　猛利龍王　黃目龍王　電光龍王　大電光龍王　天力龍王　金婆羅龍王　妙蓋龍王　甘露龍王　得道泉龍王　琉璃光龍王　金色髮龍王　金光龍王　月光相龍王　日光龍王　始興龍王　牛頭龍王　白相龍王　黑相龍王　耶摩龍王　沙彌龍王　蝦蟇龍王　僧伽茶龍王　尼民陀羅龍王　持地龍王　千頭龍王　寶頂龍王　滿願龍王　細雨龍王　須彌那龍王　瞿波羅龍王　仁德龍王　善行龍王　宿德龍王　金毘羅龍王　金毘羅頭龍王　持毒龍王　蛇身龍王　蓮華龍王　大尾龍王　騰轉龍王　可畏龍王　善威德龍王　五頭龍王　婆利羅龍王　妙車龍王　優多羅龍王　長尾龍王　大頭龍王　賓畢迦龍王　毘茶龍王　馬形龍王　三頭龍王　龍仙龍王　大威德龍王　火德龍王　恐人龍王　焰光龍王　七頭龍王　現大身龍王　善愛見龍王　大惡龍王　淨威德龍王　妙眼龍王　大毒龍王　焰聚龍王　大害龍王　大瞋忿龍王　寶雲龍王　大雲施水龍王　帝釋光龍王　波陀波龍王　月雲龍王　海雲龍王　大香華龍王　華出龍王　寶眼龍王　大相幢龍王　大雲藏龍王　降雪龍王　威德藏龍王　雲戟龍王　持夜龍王　降雨龍王　雲雨龍王　大雲雨龍王　火光龍王　大雲主龍王　無瞋恚龍王　鳩鳩婆龍王　那伽首羅龍王　闍隣提龍王　雲蓋龍王　應祁羅目佉龍王　威德龍王　出雲龍王　無盡步龍王　妙相龍王　大身龍王　大腹龍王　安審龍王　丈夫龍王　歌歌那龍王　欝頭羅龍王　猛毒龍王　妙聲龍王　甘露實龍王　大散雨龍王　隱隱聲龍王　雷相擊聲龍王　鼓震聲龍王　注甘露龍王　天帝鼓龍王　霹靂音龍王　首羅仙龍王　那羅延龍王　涸水龍王　毘迦吒龍王有如是等諸大龍王而為上首。

source_sentence: 復有八十四億那由他數諸龍王。
translation: There were another 8.4 billion dragon kings that were numbered among the nayutas.

source_sentence: 俱同來彼會。
translation: They all came together to meet there.

source_sentence: 時彼一切諸龍王等從坐而起。
translation: All of those dragon kings then got up from their seats.

source_sentence: 各整衣服偏袒右臂。
translation: They each adjusted their robes, bared their right arm, and put their right knee on the ground and bowed their palms to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 右膝著地合掌向佛。
translation: They knelt on their right knee and put their palms together to face the Buddha.

source_sentence: 即以種種無量無邊阿僧祇數。
translation: They then presented him with a variety of incalculable and limitless incense.

source_sentence: 微妙香華塗香末香。
translation: They were decorated with flowers, subtle incense, and powdered incense.

source_sentence: 華冠衣服寶幢幡蓋。
translation: They were adorned with a lotus robe, a jeweled banner, and a banner and canopy.

source_sentence: 龍華寶冠真珠瓔珞。
translation: A jeweled crown of dragons and flowers, a necklace of genuine pearls and jewelry, and a net of jewels and silken fabric.

source_sentence: 寶華繒綵真珠羅網。
translation: Jeweled flowers, silken ribbons, and genuine pearls wrap themselves in a net.

source_sentence: 雜珮旒蘇覆如來上。
translation: A tapestry of mixed jewels and tassels covers the Tathāgata's head.

source_sentence: 作眾妓樂擊掌歌讚。
translation: He creates a multitude of musicians, claps his hands, and sings his praises.

source_sentence: 起大殷重奇特之心。
translation: They give rise to a great sense of respect and wonder.

source_sentence: 繞百千匝却住一面。
translation: They circled him a hundred thousand times and withdrew to one side.

source_sentence: 爾時諸龍住一面已咸發願言。
translation: After they stood to one side, the dragons all made a vow, saying.

source_sentence: 願以一切諸世界海微塵身海。
translation: "May I take the ocean of all the worlds and the ocean of dusty bodies.

source_sentence: 一切諸佛菩薩眾海。
translation: An ocean of all buddhas and bodhisattvas!

source_sentence: 遍於一切諸世界海。
translation: ...pervade all the oceans of worlds.

source_sentence: 已過所有一切四大地水火風微塵等海。
translation: I've surpassed all the four great oceans of earth, water, fire, wind, and subtle particles.

source_sentence: 所有一切諸色光明微塵數海。
translation: All the oceans of tiny dust motes of form and light.

source_sentence: 已過無量無不可思議不可宣說。
translation: They have already passed through measureless, unfathomable, and inexpressible oceans.

source_sentence: 阿僧祇數諸身等海。
translation: It's a sea of incalculable bodies and so forth.

source_sentence: 於一一身化作無量阿僧祇諸手海雲遍滿十方。
translation: In a single body, it transforms into a myriad incalculably large sea cloud of hands that fills the ten directions.

source_sentence: 又於一一微塵分中。
translation: In each tiny particle, they also create measureless sea clouds of offerings.

source_sentence: 化出無量供養海雲遍滿十方。
translation: Measureless sea clouds of offerings are conjured up to fill the ten directions.

source_sentence: 將以供養一切諸佛菩薩眾海恒不斷絕。
translation: These oceans of offerings to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas will never cease.

source_sentence: 如是無量不可思議不可宣說。
translation: Thus, there are measureless, unfathomable, and inexpressible offerings.

source_sentence: 阿僧祇數普賢菩薩行身海雲。
translation: There are incalculable numbers of sea clouds of the bodhisattva's practice body.

source_sentence: 遍滿虛空住持不絕。
translation: They fill space and never cease to exist.

source_sentence: 如是菩薩諸身海雲。
translation: Thus are these sea clouds of bodily forms of the bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 所謂一切輪相海雲　一切寶冠海雲　一切大明寶藏輦海雲　一切末香樹藏海雲　一切香煙現諸色海雲　一切諸樂音聲海雲　一切香樹海雲　諸如是等無量無邊。
translation: They are all the sea clouds of wheel marks, all the sea clouds of the jeweled crown, all the sea clouds of the great luminous jeweled treasury, all the sea clouds of the terminal fragrance tree treasury, all the sea clouds of smoke and visible form, all the sea clouds of joyful sounds, all the sea clouds of fragrant trees, and so on, which are measureless and limitless.

source_sentence: 不可思議不可宣說阿僧祇數。
translation: Inconceivable, ineffable, and ineffable, they are incalculable.

source_sentence: 如是一切供養海雲　遍滿虛空住持不絕。
translation: Thus, these sea clouds of offerings pervade space and are sustained without break.

source_sentence: 供養恭敬尊重禮拜一切諸佛菩薩眾海。
translation: They make offerings to, revere, respect, and venerate all the sea of buddhas and bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 復出一切莊嚴境界電藏摩尼王海雲　一切普明寶雨莊嚴摩尼王海雲　一切寶光焰順佛音聲摩尼王海雲　一切佛法音聲遍滿摩尼寶王海雲　一切普門寶焰諸佛化光海雲　一切眾光明莊嚴顯現不絕摩尼寶王海雲　一切光焰順佛聖行摩尼寶王海雲　一切顯現如來不可思議佛剎電光明摩尼王海雲　一切諸妙寶色明徹三世佛身摩尼王海雲　諸如是等一切諸寶光色。
translation: 復出一切莊嚴境界電藏摩尼王海雲　一切普明寶雨莊嚴摩尼王海雲　一切寶光焰順佛音聲摩尼王海雲　一切佛法音聲遍滿摩尼寶王海雲　一切普門寶焰諸佛化光海雲　一切眾光明莊嚴顯現不絕摩尼寶王海雲　一切光焰順佛聖行摩尼寶王海雲　一切顯現如來不可思議佛剎電光明摩尼王海雲　一切諸妙寶色明徹三世佛身摩尼王海雲　諸如是等一切諸寶光色。

source_sentence: 遍滿虛空住持不絕。
translation: They fill space and never cease to abide.

source_sentence: 供養恭敬尊重禮拜一切諸佛菩薩眾海。
translation: They make offerings to, honor, respect, and venerate the multitude of buddhas and bodhisattvas in the ocean.

source_sentence: 復出一切不壞妙寶香華輦海雲　一切無邊色摩尼寶王莊嚴輦海雲　一切寶燈香焰光輦海雲　一切真珠妙色輦海雲　一切華臺輦海雲　一切寶冠莊嚴輦海雲　一切十方光焰遍滿莊嚴不絕寶藏輦海雲　一切無邊顯現勝寶莊嚴輦海雲　一切遍滿妙莊嚴輦海雲　一切門欄華鈴羅網輦海雲　諸如是等遍滿虛空住持不絕。
translation: There also arises a sea of fragrant flowers of all indestructible marvelous treasures, a sea cloud of the adornment of the maṇi-jeweled king of infinite color, a sea cloud of the fragrant, flaming light of all the precious lamps, a sea cloud of the marvelous color of all the true pearls, a sea cloud of the floral dais, a sea cloud of the adornment of the jeweled crown, a sea cloud of the adornment of the treasure house, a sea cloud of the adornment of the light of all the ten directions, a sea cloud of the adornment of the infinite manifestation of the finest treasures, a sea cloud of the adornment of all the marvelous adornment, a sea cloud of the adornment of the flower-bells, a sea cloud of the adornment of the webs, and so forth that pervades space and doesn't cease to abide.

source_sentence: 供養恭敬禮拜一切諸佛菩薩眾海雲。
translation: There's a vast cloud of offerings, respect, and veneration to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 復出一切妙金寶瓔珞藏師子座海雲　一切華明妙色藏師子座海雲　一切紺摩尼閻浮檀妙色蓮華藏師子座海雲　一切摩尼燈蓮華藏師子座海雲　一切摩尼寶幢火色妙華藏師子座海雲　一切寶莊嚴妙色蓮華藏師子座海雲　一切樂見因陀羅蓮華光藏師子座海雲　一切樂見無盡焰光蓮華藏師子座海雲　一切寶光普照蓮華藏師子座海雲　一切佛音蓮華光藏師子座海雲　諸如是等遍滿虛空住持不絕。
translation: 復出一切妙金寶瓔珞藏師子座海雲　一切華明妙色藏師子座海雲　一切紺摩尼閻浮檀妙色蓮華藏師子座海雲　一切摩尼燈蓮華藏師子座海雲　一切摩尼寶幢火色妙華藏師子座海雲　一切寶莊嚴妙色蓮華藏師子座海雲　一切樂見因陀羅蓮華光藏師子座海雲　一切樂見無盡焰光蓮華藏師子座海雲　一切寶光普照蓮華藏師子座海雲　一切佛音蓮華光藏師子座海雲　諸如是等遍滿虛空住持不絕。

source_sentence: 供養恭敬禮拜一切諸佛菩薩眾海。
translation: They make offerings to and venerate all the buddhas and bodhisattvas in the ocean.

source_sentence: 復出一切妙音摩尼樹海雲　一切諸葉周匝合掌出香氣樹海雲　一切莊嚴現無邊明色樹海雲　一切華雲出寶樹海雲　一切出於無邊莊嚴藏樹海雲　一切寶輪焰電樹海雲　一切示現菩薩半身出栴檀末樹海雲　一切不思議無邊樹神莊嚴菩薩道場樹海雲　一切寶衣藏日電光明樹海雲　一切遍出真妙音聲喜見樹海雲　諸如是等遍滿虛空住持不絕。
translation: There's also a sea of all the wonderful-sounding maṇi trees, a sea of all the leaves that circle together with their palms emitting fragrance, a sea of all the trees adorned with the manifestation of limitless brilliant colors, a sea of all the clouds of flowers that emit treasure, a sea of all the trees that emit limitless adornment, a sea of all the treasure-wheel-flaming lightning trees, a sea of all the half-bodies of the bodhisattvas that emit sandalwood, a sea of all the inconceivable and limitless trees that adorn the bodhisattva's place of practice, a sea of all the jeweled-robe stores with sunlight and lightning, a sea of all the trees that emit truly wonderful sounds and joyful views, and so forth that pervade space and are maintained without break.

source_sentence: 供養恭敬尊重禮拜一切諸佛菩薩眾海。
translation: They make offerings to, honor, respect, and venerate all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas in their oceans.

source_sentence: 復出一切無邊寶色蓮華藏師子座海雲　一切周匝摩尼王電藏師子座海雲　一切瓔珞莊嚴藏師子座海雲　一切諸妙寶冠燈焰藏師子座海雲　一切圓音出寶雨藏師子座海雲　一切華冠香華寶藏師子座海雲　一切佛坐現莊嚴摩尼王藏師子座海雲　一切欄楯垂瓔莊嚴藏師子座海雲　一切摩尼寶樹枝葉末香藏師子座海雲　一切妙香寶鈴羅網普莊嚴日電藏師子座海雲　諸如是等遍滿虛空住持不絕。
translation: There's also a sea cloud of all the infinitely colored lotus treasures that rise from the lion-seat, a sea cloud of all the circumambulating maṇi-ruler electricity treasures, a sea cloud of all the diadem adornment treasures, a sea cloud of all the marvelous jeweled crown lamp and flame treasures, a sea cloud of all the perfectly sounding jeweled rain treasures, a sea cloud of all the flower crowns, fragrant flowers, and precious treasures, a sea cloud of all the Buddha-seat adorned maṇi-ruler treasures, a sea cloud of all the railing-draped diadem adornment treasures, a sea cloud of all the maṇi-jewel tree branch and leaf end fragrance treasures, a sea cloud of all the marvelous fragrant jeweled bell and net universal adorned sun and lightning treasures, a sea cloud of all the lion-seat masters, such and such that fill space and abide uninterrupted.

source_sentence: 供養恭敬尊重禮拜一切諸佛菩薩眾海。
translation: They make offerings to, honor, respect, and venerate the multitude of buddhas and bodhisattvas in the ocean.

source_sentence: 復出一切如意摩尼寶王帳海雲　一切因陀羅寶華臺諸華莊嚴帳海雲　一切香摩尼帳海雲　一切寶燈焰相帳海雲　一切佛神力出聲摩尼寶王帳海雲　一切顯現摩尼妙衣諸光莊嚴帳海雲　一切華光焰寶帳海雲　一切羅網妙鈴出聲遍滿帳海雲　一切無盡妙色摩尼珠臺蓮花羅網帳海雲　一切金華臺火光寶幢帳海雲　一切不思議莊嚴諸光瓔珞帳海雲　諸如是等遍滿虛空住持不絕。
translation: 復出一切如意摩尼寶王帳海雲　一切因陀羅寶華臺諸華莊嚴帳海雲　一切香摩尼帳海雲　一切寶燈焰相帳海雲　一切佛神力出聲摩尼寶王帳海雲　一切顯現摩尼妙衣諸光莊嚴帳海雲　一切華光焰寶帳海雲　一切羅網妙鈴出聲遍滿帳海雲　一切無盡妙色摩尼珠臺蓮花羅網帳海雲　一切金華臺火光寶幢帳海雲　一切不思議莊嚴諸光瓔珞帳海雲　諸如是等遍滿虛空住持不絕。

source_sentence: 供養恭敬尊重禮拜一切諸佛菩薩眾海。
translation: They make offerings to, honor, respect, and venerate all the buddhas and bodhisattvas in their oceans.

source_sentence: 復出一切雜妙摩尼寶蓋海雲　一切無量光明莊嚴華蓋海雲　一切無邊色真珠藏妙蓋海雲　一切諸佛菩薩慈門音摩尼王蓋海雲　一切妙色寶焰華冠妙蓋海雲　一切寶光明莊嚴垂鈴羅網妙蓋海雲　一切摩尼樹枝瓔珞蓋海雲　一切日照明徹焰摩尼王諸香煙蓋海雲　一切栴檀末藏普熏蓋海雲　一切極佛境界電光焰莊嚴普遍蓋海雲　諸如是等遍滿虛空住持不絕。
translation: There's also a sea cloud of all the various wonderful maṇi jewels, a sea cloud of all the immeasurably bright adorned flower canopies, a sea cloud of all the infinitely colored true pearl stores, a sea cloud of all the buddhas and bodhisattvas' benevolent sounds, a sea cloud of all the wonderful canopies of the maṇi king of the marvelously colored jeweled flaming flower crowns, a sea cloud of all the wonderful canopies of the adorned jeweled light dangling from bells and nets, a sea cloud of all the maṇi tree branches, a sea cloud of all the sun-illuminating penetrating flaming maṇi kings, a sea cloud of all the fragrant smoke, a sea cloud of all the sandalwood end stores, a sea cloud of all the extremely bright and flaming adorned universal canopies of the Buddha's realm, and so forth that fill space and abide unbroken.

source_sentence: 供養恭敬尊重禮拜一切諸佛菩薩眾海雲　復出一切寶明輪海雲　一切寶焰相光輪海雲　一切華雲焰光輪海雲　一切佛花寶光明輪海雲　一切佛剎現入光明輪海雲　一切諸佛境界普門音聲寶枝光輪海雲　一切琉璃寶性摩尼王焰光輪海雲　一切眾生於一念時現於色相光輪海雲　一切音聲悅可諸佛大震光輪海雲　一切所化眾生眾會妙音摩尼王光輪海雲　諸如是等遍滿虛空住持不絕供養恭敬尊重禮拜一切諸佛菩薩眾海雲。
translation: Offerings, respect, honor, and veneration to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas are prevalent in the sea of offerings. There also arises a sea of all jeweled luminous circles, a sea of all jeweled flaming formations, a sea of jeweled flaming circles, a sea of all flower-cloud flaming circles, a sea of all buddha-flower jeweled luminous circles, a sea of all buddha-base manifestation entry luminous circles, a sea of all beryl jeweled nature maṇi-ruler flaming circles, a sea of all sentient beings manifesting in form at a single moment of thought, a sea of all sounds that please the buddhas and great vibrating luminous circles, a sea of many wonderful sounds maṇi-ruler luminosity that creates all sentient beings and congregations, a sea of all such things that fill space, are sustained, and don't end.

source_sentence: 復出一切摩尼藏焰海雲　一切佛色聲香味觸光焰海雲　一切寶焰海雲　一切佛法震聲遍滿焰海雲　一切佛剎莊嚴電光焰海雲　一切華輦光焰海雲　一切寶笛光焰海雲　一切劫數佛出音聲教化眾生光焰海雲　一切無盡寶華鬘示現眾生光焰海雲　一切諸座示現莊嚴光焰海雲　諸如是等遍滿虛空住持不絕。
translation: There also arises a sea cloud of all maṇi store flames, a sea cloud of the Buddha's form, sound, odor, taste, and tactile light, a sea cloud of all treasure flames, a sea cloud of the Buddha's Dharma sound vibrating all over, a sea cloud of the Buddha's temple adornment light, a sea cloud of the flower-body light, a sea cloud of the precious flute light, a sea cloud of the eons-long Buddha's sound teaching sentient beings, a sea cloud of the endlessly jeweled flower garlands that reveal the light and flames of sentient beings, a sea cloud of the adorned light and flames of the seats that reveal themselves, and so forth that pervade space and abide uninterrupted.

source_sentence: 供養恭敬尊重禮拜一切諸佛菩薩眾海雲。
translation: There's a sea cloud of offerings, respect, veneration, and worship of all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 復出一切不斷不散無邊色寶光海雲　一切摩尼寶王普光海雲　一切佛剎莊嚴電光海雲　一切香光海雲　一切莊嚴光海雲　一切佛化身光海雲　一切雜寶樹華鬘光海雲　一切衣服光海雲　一切無邊菩薩諸行名稱寶王光海雲　一切真珠燈光海雲　諸如是等遍滿虛空住持不絕。
translation: There's also a sea cloud of all the unceasing, undistracted, limitlessly colored, precious light, a sea cloud of the pervasive light of the king of maṇi jewels, a sea cloud of the adorned electric light of all the buddha bases, a sea cloud of the light of incense, a sea cloud of the adorned light, a sea cloud of the light of all the buddha's transformation bodies, a sea cloud of the light of all the sundry precious trees and flower garlands, a sea cloud of the light of all the clothes, a sea cloud of the light of the jeweled king of the names of the infinite bodhisattvas' practices, a sea cloud of the light of the true jeweled lamp, and so forth that pervades space and abides uninterrupted.

source_sentence: 供養恭敬尊重禮拜一切諸佛菩薩眾海雲。
translation: There's a sea cloud of offerings, respect, veneration, and worship of all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 復出一切不可思議種種諸雜香華海雲　一切寶焰蓮華羅網海雲　一切無量無邊際色摩尼寶王光輪海雲　一切摩尼真珠色藏篋笥海雲　一切摩尼妙寶栴檀末香海雲　一切摩尼寶蓋海雲　一切清淨諸妙音聲悅可眾心寶王海雲　一切日光寶輪瓔珞旒蘇海雲　一切無邊寶藏海雲　一切普賢色身海雲　諸如是等遍滿虛空住持不絕供養恭敬尊重禮拜一切諸佛菩薩眾海雲。
translation: 復出一切不可思議種種諸雜香華海雲　一切寶焰蓮華羅網海雲　一切無量無邊際色摩尼寶王光輪海雲　一切摩尼真珠色藏篋笥海雲　一切摩尼妙寶栴檀末香海雲　一切摩尼寶蓋海雲　一切清淨諸妙音聲悅可眾心寶王海雲　一切日光寶輪瓔珞旒蘇海雲　一切無邊寶藏海雲　一切普賢色身海雲　諸如是等遍滿虛空住持不絕供養恭敬尊重禮拜一切諸佛菩薩眾海雲。

source_sentence: 爾時此眾八十四億百千那由他諸龍王等作是願已。
translation: At the time, this multitude of 8,400,000,000 nayutas and other dragon kings made this vow.

source_sentence: 繞佛三匝頭面作禮於一面立。
translation: They circled the Buddha three times, paid homage with their heads and faces, and stood to one side.

source_sentence: 是時佛告諸龍王言。
translation: The Buddha then addressed the dragon kings and said.

source_sentence: 汝等龍王各宜復坐。
translation: "You dragon kings, it's appropriate for you to resume your seats.

source_sentence: 時諸龍王聞佛語已。
translation: After the dragon kings heard what the Buddha said, they each returned to sit in order.

source_sentence: 各各還依次第而坐。
translation: Each of them returned to sit in order.

source_sentence: 爾時眾中有一龍王。
translation: At the time, there was one dragon king among the crowd.

source_sentence: 名曰無邊莊嚴海雲威德輪蓋。
translation: His name was Infinite Adornment, the ocean cloud, and the wheel cap of might and power.

source_sentence: 於此三千大千世界龍王之中。
translation: Among these 3,000 great thousand world dragon kings, he was the most distinguished and powerful.

source_sentence: 最為勝大得不退轉。
translation: He's the most distinguished and powerful, and he's attained irreversibility.

source_sentence: 本願力故受此龍身。
translation: It was because of the power of his original vow that he accepted this dragon's body.

source_sentence: 為欲供養恭敬禮拜於如來故。
translation: It's because he wants to make offerings, respect, and venerate the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 聽受正法來生至此閻浮提內。
translation: He heard that he'd be born here in Jambudvīpa after accepting the right teaching.

source_sentence: 時彼龍王從坐而起。
translation: That dragon king then got up from his seat.

source_sentence: 整理衣服偏袒右臂。
translation: He adjusted his robes and bared his right arm.

source_sentence: 右膝著地合掌向佛。
translation: He knelt on his right knee and put his palms together toward the Buddha.

source_sentence: 而作是言世尊我今有疑。
translation: He said, "Bhagavān, now I have some doubts.

source_sentence: 欲問如來至真等正覺。
translation: I want to ask the Tathāgata about the most true and perfectly enlightened one.

source_sentence: 若佛聽許我乃敢問。
translation: If the Buddha heeds my permission, then I'll dare to ask.

source_sentence: 作是語已默然而住。
translation: After saying this, he waited silently.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊告無邊莊嚴海雲威德輪蓋龍王作如是言。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the dragon king of the infinitely adorned ocean cloud of mighty power, the wheel cap, and said this.

source_sentence: 汝大龍王若有疑者恣聽汝問。
translation: "You, great dragon king, if you have any doubts, I will freely listen to your questions.

source_sentence: 吾當為汝分別解說令汝歡喜。
translation: I will explain them for you and make you happy.'

source_sentence: 作是語已。
translation: After he said that, he did so.

source_sentence: 時無邊莊嚴海雲威德輪蓋龍王。
translation: The Infinitely Adorned Ocean cloud, the Wheel-Turning Dragon King of Might and Power, then said to the Buddha, "Yes, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 即白佛言唯然世尊。
translation: He said to the Buddha, "Yes, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 云何能使諸龍王等。
translation: "Bhagavān, how can you cause these dragon kings and so forth...

source_sentence: 滅一切苦得受安樂。
translation: How can I cause them to cease all suffering and attain well-being?

source_sentence: 受安樂已又令於此閻浮提內。
translation: After they experience well-being, they'll cause them to live here in Jambudvīpa.

source_sentence: 時降甘雨生長一切樹木叢林藥草苗稼皆生滋味。
translation: Sweet rain will then fall, growing all the trees and groves, and medicinal plants and crops will grow and taste good.

source_sentence: 使閻浮提一切人等悉受快樂。
translation: That causes all the people of Jambudvīpa to experience happiness.

source_sentence: 爾時世尊聞是語已。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān heard these words.

source_sentence: 即告無邊莊嚴海雲威德輪蓋大龍王言。
translation: He then addressed the great dragon king, the ocean cloud of infinite adornment and the wheel cap of might, saying.

source_sentence: 善哉善哉。
translation: "Good, good!

source_sentence: 汝今為彼諸眾生等作利益故。
translation: Now, for the benefit of those sentient beings and so forth, you can ask the Tathāgata about such things.

source_sentence: 能問如來如是等事。
translation: Can you ask the Tathāgata about such things?'

source_sentence: 汝大龍王諦聽諦聽善思念之。
translation: Listen closely, you great dragon king, and well consider it.

source_sentence: 我當為汝分別解說。
translation: I will explain it for you in detail.

source_sentence: 輪蓋龍王我有一法。
translation: 'Wheel-Thatching Dragon King, I have one thing.

source_sentence: 汝等若能具足行者。
translation: If you can completely practice it, you will cause all dragons to cease suffering and fulfill the requirements of the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 令一切龍除滅諸苦具足安樂何者一法。
translation: What's that one thing that will cause all dragons to cease suffering and attain well-being?

source_sentence: 謂行大慈。
translation: It's practicing great kindness.

source_sentence: 汝大龍王若有天人行大慈者。
translation: You, great dragon king, if there are gods and humans who practice great kindness.

source_sentence: 火不能燒水不能溺。
translation: Fire can't burn, water can't drown, and poison can't harm, and blades can't injure.

source_sentence: 毒不能害刃不能傷。
translation: Poison can't harm them, and blades can't injure them.

source_sentence: 內外怨賊不能侵掠。
translation: Internal and external enemies and thieves can't plunder them.

source_sentence: 若睡若寤皆得安隱。
translation: Whether asleep or awake, they'll attain peace.

source_sentence: 行大慈力有大威德。
translation: He exercises the power of great kindness and has great authority.

source_sentence: 諸天世等不能擾亂。
translation: The gods and worldlings can't be disturbed.

source_sentence: 形貌端嚴眾所愛敬。
translation: Their appearance is dignified, and they're loved by everyone.

source_sentence: 所行之處一切無礙。
translation: Where they walk, they're completely unobstructed.

source_sentence: 諸苦滅除心得歡喜。
translation: Their pains are ceased, and their minds are joyous.

source_sentence: 諸樂具足大慈力故。
translation: Their pleasures are complete, and it's because of the power of great kindness that they attain birth in the Brahma Heaven.

source_sentence: 命終之後得生梵天。
translation: After his life ends, he'll be born in the Brahma Heaven.

source_sentence: 汝大龍王若有天人行大慈者。
translation: "You, great dragon king, if there are gods and humans who practice great kindness.

source_sentence: 獲如是等無量無邊利益之事。
translation: They'll attain measureless and limitless benefits like these.

source_sentence: 是故龍王身口意業常應須行彼大慈行。
translation: Therefore, the physical, verbal, and mental activities of the dragon king should always involve the practice of that great kindness.

source_sentence: 復次龍王有陀羅尼。
translation: "Furthermore, the dragon king has a dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 名施一切眾生安樂。
translation: It's called "Giving All Sentient Beings Peace and Bliss.

source_sentence: 汝諸龍等常須讀誦繫念受持。
translation: You dragons must always recite it, memorize it, and memorize it.

source_sentence: 能滅一切諸龍苦惱與其安樂。
translation: It will end the suffering and distress of all dragons and give them well-being.

source_sentence: 彼諸龍等既得樂已。
translation: Once those dragons attain happiness, then they'll be able to rely on Jambudvīpa at that time.

source_sentence: 於閻浮提始能依時降注甘雨。
translation: Then, in Jambudvīpa, they'll be able to rain sweet rain at the appropriate time.

source_sentence: 使令一切樹木叢林。
translation: It causes all the trees and groves.

source_sentence: 藥草苗稼皆出滋味。
translation: Medicinal plants and crops all produce flavor.

source_sentence: 爾時龍王復白佛言。
translation: It was then that the dragon king again said to the Buddha.

source_sentence: 何者名為施一切樂陀羅尼句。
translation: "What's the dhāraṇī phrase for bestowing all kinds of happiness?

source_sentence: 爾時世尊即說呪曰。
translation: The Bhagavān then spoke the dhāraṇī, saying.

source_sentence: 怛緻咃(其呪字口傍作者轉舌讀之注引字者引聲讀之)陀(引)囉尼陀(引)囉尼(一)優多(引)囉尼(二引)三(引)波囉帝(諸呪帝皆丁利反)師郗(攄利反三)毘闍耶跋囒那(引)薩底夜波羅帝若(女賀反四)波囉呵若那跋帝(五)優多波(引)達尼(六)毘那(引)喝膩(七)阿(引)毘屣(引)遮膩(八)阿陛毘(引)耶(引)呵邏(九)輸婆(引)跋帝(十)頞耆(市尸反)摩哆(十一)[黑*(企-止+ㄎ)]咥(顯利反十二)宮婆羅(引十三)鞞咥(香利反引)婆呵(十四)摩羅吉梨舍(引)達那(引)波唅(十五)輸(輸律反)陀(引)耶摩(引)伽尼梨呵迦達摩多(十六)輸(輸律反)陀(引)盧迦(十七)毘帝寐囉何囉闍婆獨佉賒摩那(去聲十八)薩婆佛陀婆盧歌那(去聲十九)波羅闍若(引)闍那(引)鞞醯莎(引)呵汝大龍王。
translation: 怛緻咃(其呪字口傍作者轉舌讀之注引字者引聲讀之)陀(引)囉尼陀(引)囉尼(一)優多(引)囉尼(二引)三(引)波囉帝(諸呪帝皆丁利反)師郗(攄利反三)毘闍耶跋囒那(引)薩底夜波羅帝若(女賀反四)波囉呵若那跋帝(五)優多波(引)達尼(六)毘那(引)喝膩(七)阿(引)毘屣(引)遮膩(八)阿陛毘(引)耶(引)呵邏(九)輸婆(引)跋帝(十)頞耆(市尸反)摩哆(十一)[黑*(企-止+ㄎ)]咥(顯利反十二)宮婆羅(引十三)鞞咥(香利反引)婆呵(十四)摩羅吉梨舍(引)達那(引)波唅(十五)輸(輸律反)陀(引)耶摩(引)伽尼梨呵迦達摩多(十六)輸(輸律反)陀(引)盧迦(十七)毘帝寐囉何囉闍婆獨佉賒摩那(去聲十八)薩婆佛陀婆盧歌那(去聲十九)波羅闍若(引)闍那(引)鞞醯莎(引)呵汝大龍王。

source_sentence: 此呪名為施一切樂陀羅尼句。
translation: This dhāraṇī is called the dhāraṇī phrase for bestowing all kinds of happiness.

source_sentence: 諸佛所持汝等常須受持讀誦。
translation: It's upheld by the buddhas and you must always memorize it and recite it.

source_sentence: 吉事成就得入法門獲安隱樂。
translation: You'll achieve good fortune and enter the Dharma gate, attaining peace and happiness.

source_sentence: 復次龍王。
translation: "Furthermore, Dragon King.

source_sentence: 有大雲所生威神莊嚴功德智相雲輪水藏化金色光毘盧遮那一毛孔中。
translation: There's a great cloud of [images of] authoritative power, adornment, merit, and wisdom that appears in a golden light from the cloud, the water store, and the Vairocana's single pore.

source_sentence: 出於同姓諸佛名號。
translation: It comes from the names of buddhas of the same lineage.

source_sentence: 汝等亦須憶念受持。
translation: You must also remember and bear them in mind.

source_sentence: 若持彼諸如來名號。
translation: If you hold onto the names of those tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 能滅一切所有諸龍種姓。
translation: They'll extinguish all the nāgas and dragons of their lineage.

source_sentence: 一切龍王眷屬徒眾。
translation: All the dragons, their retinues, and their followers.

source_sentence: 并諸龍女生龍宮者。
translation: All the dragons, girls, and naval guardians.

source_sentence: 所有苦惱與其安樂。
translation: They'll be given comfort and happiness along with all their suffering and distress.

source_sentence: 是故龍王應當稱彼如來名號。
translation: Therefore, dragon kings should call on those tathāgatas by their names.
